Text: Im gonna download this, I hope this works :)

F&*^ you guys with the surveys!! 
The game keeps crashing when pressing New Game and reinstalling Steam doesn't help, not even DX 11 nor the drivers for the Graphic Card.

Ok I finally finished downloading this game and I got it working seamlessly. I am now going to seed it so everyone can enjoy this awesome game. The potential problems I can see other people having with getting this to work is an out dated or their computer not meeting system requirements. Other than that if you followed the instructions everything should be perfect. Time to take control of agent 47 and wipe out some targets. :)

I had problem with crash after new game, but i resolved that and it works for me now.When i installed things like physics, drivers and so on, the game still not worked. So after that i downloaded some russian version of this game, this was crap too for me, but i realized that in this version was crack exe file called "game" not "HMA", so i installed first version from "SKIDROW" again and renamed the .exe file from "HMA" to "game" and it works. 

 Sorry for english

 I hope this will help someone elese

idk what u guys are talking about there's no surveys. You can go ahead and dl. It works perfect. Everything is unlocked and it doesn't crash. 
ofc, I know what i am doing...do you?
